I would definitely suggest this place for a sweet treat!! The staff are nice and the spot is always clean. Everything I have tried so far has been delicious and they take their time to make sure the shakes and crepes are made to perfection.

Store is small and gets warm quick. Ordered the Cinnamon Toast Lovers Crepe with white chocolate because they ran out of cinnamon butter. It was amazing. The Dubai Strawberry Cup, however, was caked with an overwhelming amount of Pistachio‚Ä¶

I always come here for my favorite dessertsss late at night and they are always in stock with whatever i craveeee, alsoo no need to ask for any extra topping like chocolate drizzle or anything because they always come with more than enough ü•∞ yummmyyy‚Ä¶

I was pleasantly surprised to find this incredible place near my house..  I had a hankering for ice cream and I Googled Ice cream near me and this place came up.  The service is great and the ice cream even greater.  I got the cheesecake‚Ä¶

Staff is super nice and welcoming. The girl at front was very helpful trying to help me find something  to satisfy my cravings. They had so many amazing options on the menu. Ended up getting the house special and it was amazing.

i've been coming here since they opened .. found them on instagram and saw they were opening a store near me. i always get the same thing, crepe lotus biscoff spread + cookie, strawberries, and whipped cream! excellent every time! keep doing what you're doing!

Placed an order for a Pistachio covered cheesecake from Uber Eats. Will edit with a review. Update: the cheesecake was amazing! It was like Heaven on Earth. I‚Äôve ordered from here several more times and have never been disappointed. I just have to be careful because I‚Äôm at risk for Diabetes.

The staff were very nice especially since it was my first time here and helped me pick my order. The food was also very good and I‚Äôm not much of a sweet tooth but the taste was amazing. The only thing is that it can get crowded but it‚Äôs worth it.
It was so Good üòä I highly recommend coming here and the service was amazing. Will come again! Definitely üòÅ‚Ä¶

I love love love this establishment. The Bronx needs more cool places like this , the Bronx people deserve all these great tasting snacks. The snacks are so good and the staff is great as well. I love the shakes and the waffle sticks . This is definitely one of my favorites places , when I need something for my sweet tooth. The chocolate fountain looks amazing as well . Can‚Äôt wait to come back .

Nice small spot in the BX near the stadium. I‚Äôve visited several times after work and my favorites are their chocolate dipped strawberries, waffles and New Yorker shake. I wish they had the space for dine in but aside that they give good customer service.
Chocolate house dessert is so good , I get there lemonade and crepes . I‚Äôm there everyday to get there strawberry sticks .

I come here all the time, treats are 10/10 !!
And everyone here is so nice , it‚Äôs getting hard to unbig my back at this point.

Lots of great sweet treats options,  although wasn't impressed with Dubai chocolate cup, but Im not a big chocolate lover. Ingredients fresh, presentation nice. Very good service. They need a little more space for a Cafe like this, very‚Ä¶

Love this new addition to the Bronx - right next to Yankees stadium. Everything is made fresh in-house. I loved the Rocky Mountain crepe, fruity pebbles milkshake, waffles + brownie sundae. And who could leave without getting chocolate covered strawberries? The staff is so friendly and fast at preparing everything. Please go support this neighborhood gem!
This place is so good omgggg. It is pretty pricey and the store is cramped usually with a line out the door. The options are plenty and can be overwhelming.
Delicious Lotus shake and the  strawberry stick Delicious.  Birthday cake crepe amazing
Chocolate House is beyond delightful ! Saja is very sweet and gets your order out quick! We order the Dubai chocolate mini pancakes with strawberries - delicious
This place had very friendly workers and fast service. I got the Dubai shake and it was honestly the best milkshake I have ever tried. Overall amazing.
Daughter loves this place, and I love for her. Thank you guys for making it a great experience.

Customer service was bad, the presentation was even worse. I ordered a strawberry and banana smoothie and only received strawberries, in addition the strawberries were old and sour. When I asked for simple changes as in milk chocolate instead of Nutella because of my allergy I was told it would be extra. Overall experience 2/10. I would recommend the one on tremont
I had the most amazing lava cake. The service was excellent.
Great service , Very fast . I got a mango lemonade with a Oreo waffle.

Sweets for the sweeties‚Ä¶. This low key dessert shop located in The  Bronx full of sweet treats..  Delicious & deluxe-able Super sweet treats
Clean and neat environment, that‚Äôs a plus .

I stumbled upon the Chocolate House... as a person in a wheelchair there's room to move around and the staff is friendly!! Chocolate covered strawberries are bomb and the Blondie dipped in chocolate was off the chain and absolutely delicious..
I have found my new chocolate spot ü§§üòãüíØü´†

Visit Chocolate House!! Initially, I walked past them when I was making my way up to the Grand Concourse. It is a tiny spot with no indoor seating. They have really great crepes with so many options for fillings. I got a crepe and the strawberry cheesecake. I was so focused on the desserts that I forgot to take pictures. I would give the cheesecake an 8/10. The crust and cheesecake flavor is good. They also drizzle it with white chocolate and strawberry sauce. The crepes are really delicious and freshly made - 8.5/10. Next time, I have to try the milkshakes that everyone kept coming in and ordering.

El lugar es lindo aunq no hay donde sentarse demasiado peque√±o , todo debe ser para llevar , en verano deber√≠an sacar mesitas por lo menos , para l sabor delicioso , muchas opciones para tu coma diab√©tico üòÖ todo bn dulce , sabores y combinaciones ricas , vi tambn q se ponen guantes , es primordial para el servicio y calidad , me pareci√≥ s√∫per y riqu√≠simo

The place is nice although there is no place to sit too small, everything must be take away, in summer they should put out tables at least, for the delicious taste, many options for your diabetic coma üòÖ everything is sweet, delicious flavors and combinations, I also saw That they wear gloves, it is essential for the service and quality, I thought it was super and delicious

Delicious, is short of expression for this amazing stuff they have here‚Ä¶ Friendly staff, good food!! Give yourself this Christmas gift and you will not regret!!! Looking forward for
They open a spot in Jax, Florida!!
Great service and good food

Friendly cashier,  I ordered a marshmallow stick and s'more crepe for my kids and they loved it. I got myself an apple pecan pie crepe and it was delicious.. I recommend this place, if you have a sweet tooth.
I absolutely love this place. Staff is super friendly and they stay open late. Lots of good desert options and everything is made to order. Definitely a must try.

I came here for the Dubai Chocolate Strawberry cup with pistachio and kataifi. I had previously had it at the Chocolate House in Astoria Queens, and to my recollection, it wasn't as costly as this Bronx location, but I could be mistaken. I‚Ä¶

I have a crazy sweet tooth n I always come to them when I need a fix. Ive had their shakes, cakes, and I go crazy 4 their dubai items. My faves are their red velvet cake and their strawberry dubai cup. Have yet to try all the other kunafa onesü´¶‚Ä¶

As an Uber driver, I‚Äôve been picking up from Chocolate House for a while, and every time it‚Äôs nothing but good vibes and fast service.

Today, I finally decided to see what the hype was about, and let me tell you, it‚Äôs well-deserved. I had an Oreo chocolate ice cream dessert, and it was incredible. Generous portions, rich flavors, and perfectly layered‚Äîit was chocolatey and Oreo in every bite.
Cute spot to get a sweet treat! The Nutella crepe and the Red Velvet milkshake were delicious. Great customer service! Just note that there's no sitting area.
Love love love ittttt !!! My fav ! Won‚Äôt go anywhere else but here üòäüòäüòçüòç‚Ä¶
Amazinggggggg!!!! The service was great! The chocolate is DELICIOUS! :) So definitely come to Chocolate House!! :)

The service was great! The employees demonstrated genuine care for every order (which is something that CAN‚ÄôT be said about the other local businesses in the area). The strawberries and crepes were made fresh while we waited. Definitely going back!
Best chocolate in the Bronx it‚Äôs so yummy!!! 10/10 recommend. The waffle sticks are my ü§§. Customer service is always on point and orders are always correct, krystal is a great help.üòä
Very welcoming and sweet people. I ordered the Lotus Crepe and it was amazing. No complaints on the serving size of each topping.

Dubai cups are delicious! Pricey, but it's definitely worth it. They are far from cheap with everything that goes in the cup. If I had to make a suggestion, it would be adding a bit of white chocolate to give it a twist, but it's definitely good without.

My second time here. Everything I have tried has been amazing. To top it off, their service is top tier.
I recommend the strawberry shake. üçì
I was treated wonderfully by the sales associate MK. Thank you so much will be coming back everything I tasted was delicious.‚Ä¶
Love love this place it‚Äôs a must have.

I come here after work for a little pick me up treat and I‚Äôm always satisfied! The chocolate covered strawberries in a cup is always fast, but if you don‚Äôt mind waiting an extra 5 mins get yourself a Red Velvet Shake or a House Special Crepe (Lotus cookie, Strawberry, Banana and Nutellaüòç), you won‚Äôt regret it! The cashiers are always friendly and they make sure you feel welcome! Definitely will be coming back! Thank you guys!
Superb service!! Very nice and attentive people! I have been coming here a lot! Their Dubai strawberry cup is my favorite!
